dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5945 IH: Freezing and Halting Any More Alleviation of Sanctions Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Meuser (for himself, Mr. Reschenthaler, Ms. Malliotakis, Mr. Donalds, Mr. Mann, Mr. Timmons, Mrs. Houchin, Mr. Steil, Mr. Yakym, Mr. Bacon, Mr. Norman, Ms. Tenney, and Mrs. Miller-Meeks) introduced the following bill

Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committees on Financial Services, Oversight and Accountability, and Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To reinstate certain sanctions imposed with respect to Iran.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Freezing and Halting Any More Alleviation of Sanctions Act or the Freezing HAMAS Act.

section.header: Reinstatement of certain sanctions imposed with respect to Iran
section.text: Any statutory sanctions imposed with respect to Iran pursuant to section 1244(c)(1) or 1247(a) of the Iran Freedom and Counter-Proliferation Act of 2012 (22 U.S.C. 8803(c)(1) and 8806(a)), or section 1245(d)(1) of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2012 (22 U.S.C. 8513a(d)(1)), that were waived, suspended, reduced, or otherwise relieved pursuant to an agreement between the United States and the Islamic Republic of Iran, including any waiver that is the subject of the document entitled Waiver of Sanctions with Respect to the Transfer of Funds from the Republic of Korea to Qatar and transmitted to Congress on September 11, 2023, are hereby reinstated and any action by the United States Government to facilitate the release of funds or assets to Iran pursuant to such agreement, or provide any further waiver, suspension, reduction, or other relief pursuant to such agreement, is hereby prohibited.
